plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🥗 I'm good for you and can be eaten raw.
🪴 I'm a type of leafy plant!

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I'm made of wood!
🌳 I'm very big and need lots of water and sunshine.
🍁 I have branches reaching to the sky.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell nice. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 You can give me as a gift.
💐 I grow in a garden.
🌸 I have petals that can be many different colors.

plant.question: I have seeds inside, and you can eat me. I can be red, green, or yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 You can put me on a salad or a sandwich!
🌱 I grow on a vine in the garden.
☀️ I need the sun to ripen and get sweet.

plant.question: I am long and thin and grow under the ground. You can eat me cooked or raw. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me!
🥕 I am orange and crunchy.
🥕 You can dip me in hummus.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 I contain water inside.
🌴 I grow on palm trees often near the beach.
🌰 You have to crack me open to eat me.

plant.question: I'm a plant that can be very tall and strong. You can build things with my wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 My trunk is usually thick and brown.
🏡 Houses are made from cut up pieces of me!
🍂 I can live for hundreds of years!

plant.question: I have prickly needles instead of leaves and stay green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am used as decoration during winter holidays.
🟢 I smell nice and woodsy.
🎁 You can put presents under me.

plant.question: I am a green vine that grows up walls and sometimes has pretty flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I can cover a whole building if I'm left to grow!
🪴 I like to climb!
🏘️ Some kinds of me are poisonous if you eat them.

plant.question: I grow in water and have big, round leaves that float. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I provide a resting place for frogs!
🌸 Sometimes a pretty flower grows out of me.
💧 I need to float on a pond.

food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me!
💛 My color is like the sun.
🍌 I'm a fruit and you peel my skin off before eating me.

food.question: I am white and cold, and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am a very cold treat.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
🍦 I come in many flavors, like chocolate and strawberry!

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🍎 Snow White liked me.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bunnies like to eat me.
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🧡 I am the same color as a pumpkin.

food.question: I'm a drink that comes from a cow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Cows give us this.
🥛 It's white and good for your bones.
🥣 You can pour me on your cereal.

food.question: I am made of dough, and I'm baked in an oven. You can put yummy things on me, like pepperoni and cheese. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 People in Italy love to eat me.
🍕 I'm usually round and cut into slices.
🔥 I am cooked in a very hot oven.

food.question: I'm a yellow fruit with a sour taste. What am I?

hints.text: 🍋 I am a yellow citrus fruit.
😖 My taste is very sour.
🥤 You can make lemonade with me.

food.question: I am small and green, and I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow inside of a pod.
🟢 My color is green.
🍲 I am a vegetable you can eat with dinner.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, and I am long and fried. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You often eat me with ketchup.
🥔 I start as a potato.
🔥 I am fried in oil.

food.question: I am brown and hard on the outside, but soft and sweet on the inside. Monkeys climb trees looking for me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on palm trees.
🥥 I have water inside.
🪨 My shell is very hard to crack.
